Package application

Class Model

java.lang.Object
application.Model
public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
Class to manage all the model like users, polls, ...
Author:
Robin

  • Field Details

    • user_password

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> user_password
      Stores 2 arrays of string; the first one is an array of registered users and the second one is an array of password. The index of the String arrays are linked to each other.

    • user

      private java.lang.String user
      Represent the user currently Logged In

    • index_user

      private int index_user
      Represent the index of the user currently Logged In in the Arrays.

    • answered

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean>> answered
      Array of Boolean Arrays. Each Boolean Array is used to check if the user already answered a specific poll

    • poll

      private java.util.ArrayList<Poll> poll
      List of all the created poll

    • userList

      private java.util.ArrayList<User> userList
      List of all the users with their informations

      Constructor of the Model. Initialize the model with some values

  • Method Details

    • getAnswered

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getAnswered()
      Get only the Boolean Array of the current user and not the array of boolean array.
      Returns:
      Boolean Array of the current user

    • getUserInfo

      public User getUserInfo()
      Get only the User class of the current user and not the array of all the users.
      Returns:
      Boolean Array of the current user

    • setAnswered

      public void setAnswered​(int index, int poll_index, boolean value)
      Allow to change if the user answered to a question or not
      Parameters:
      index - index of the user
      poll_index - index of the poll (question 1,2,3,4)
      value - the value to be set (most of the time true )

    • setIndexUser

      public void setIndexUser​(int index)
      set the index of the current user
      Parameters:
      index - index of the user

    • check_user

      public int check_user​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Check if the combination user/password exist in the database
      Parameters:
      user -
      password -
      Returns:
      -1 if something wrong or index of the user if OK

    • add_user

      public boolean add_user​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Add a new user to the database and create a new Array List of answered poll for the new user
      Parameters:
      user -
      password -
      Returns:
      false if the String are empty or filled with blank

    • get_info

      private Poll get_info​(java.lang.String path)
      Parse a text file to generate a poll
      Parameters:
      path - path to the text file
      Returns:
      String Array with all the information
